titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study to assess the suitability and feasibility of designating areas within the island of Guam as a National Heritage Area, and for other purposes.

To direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study to assess the suitability and feasibility of designating areas within the island of Guam as a National Heritage Area, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary: The bill directs the Department of the Interior to assess the suitability and feasibility of designating areas of Guam as a National Heritage Area.
